headline: Baxter Announces Early Tender Results for 2.600% Senior Notes Due 2026 and 1.915% Senior Notes Due 2027
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., December 04, 2025--Baxter International Inc. (NYSE:BAX) ("Baxter" or the "Company") today announced the early tender results for the previously announced cash tender offers for the 2026 Notes and 2027 Notes (each as defined below). The tender offers are being made pursuant to the terms and conditions set forth in the offer to purchase, dated Nov. 19, 2025, as amended by the Company’s press release dated Nov. 19, 2025 (as it may be further amended or supplemented from time to tim
